generated.css: @keyframes allWeather{50%{transform:translateY(-5px)}}.sunny{animation:allWeather 5s linear infinite}.sunny,.sunny1{background:linear-gradient(top,hsla(0,0%,100%,0),hsla(0,0%,100%,.8) 50%,hsla(0,0%,100%,0));position:absolute;left:0;top:0}.sunny1{animation:sunny 5s linear infinite}.sunny1:after,.sunny:after{background:#fe4;border-radius:50%;box-shadow:0 0 0 15px rgba(255,255,0,.2);content:"";height:50px;width:50px;position:absolute}.sunny:after{left:70px;top:290px}.sunny1:after{left:380px;top:290px}.cloudy,.cloudy1{animation:allWeather 5s ease-in-out infinite;background:#fff;border-radius:50%;box-shadow:52px -12px 0 -4px #fff,20px -20px #fff,24px 8px #fff,48px 12px 0 -8px #fff,68px 4px 0 -4px #fff;height:50px;width:50px;position:absolute}.cloudy{left:35px;top:290px}.cloudy1{left:355px;top:290px}.rainy,.rainy1{animation:allWeather 5s ease-in-out 1s infinite;background:#ccc;border-radius:50%;box-shadow:52px -12px 0 -4px #ccc,20px -20px #ccc,24px 8px #ccc,48px 12px 0 -8px #ccc,68px 4px 0 -4px #ccc;display:block;height:50px;width:50px;position:absolute}.rainy{left:35px;top:290px}.rainy1{left:355px;top:290px}.rainy1:before,.rainy:before{animation:rainy_rain .7s linear infinite;content:"";background:#ccc;border-radius:50%;display:block;height:6px;width:3px;opacity:.3;transform:scale(.9)}@keyframes rainy_rain{0%{box-shadow:30px 30px transparent,40px 40px transparent,50px 75px #000,55px 50px #000,70px 100px #000,80px 95px #000,110px 45px #000,90px 35px #000}25%{box-shadow:30px 45px #000,40px 60px #000,50px 90px #000,55px 65px #000,70px 120px transparent,80px 120px transparent,110px 70px #000,90px 60px #000}26%{box-shadow:30px 45px #000,40px 60px #000,50px 90px #000,55px 65px #000,70px 40px transparent,80px 20px transparent,110px 70px #000,90px 60px #000}50%{box-shadow:30px 70px #000,40px 80px #000,50px 100px transparent,55px 80px #000,70px 60px #000,80px 45px #000,110px 95px #000,90px 85px #000}51%{box-shadow:30px 70px #000,40px 80px #000,50px 45px transparent,55px 80px #000,70px 60px #000,80px 45px #000,110px 95px #000,90px 85px #000}75%{box-shadow:30px 95px #000,40px 100px #000,50px 60px #000,55px 95px transparent,70px 80px #000,80px 70px #000,110px 120px transparent,90px 110px transparent}76%{box-shadow:30px 95px #000,40px 100px #000,50px 60px #000,55px 35px transparent,70px 80px #000,80px 70px #000,110px 25px transparent,90px 15px transparent}to{box-shadow:30px 120px transparent,40px 120px transparent,50px 75px #000,55px 50px #000,70px 100px #000,80px 95px #000,110px 45px #000,90px 35px #000}}.stormy,.stormy1{animation:allWeather 5s ease-in-out infinite;background:#222;border-radius:50%;box-shadow:52px -12px 0 -4px #222,20px -20px #222,24px 8px #222,48px 12px 0 -8px #222,68px 4px 0 -4px #222;height:50px;width:50px;position:absolute}.stormy{left:35px;top:290px}.stormy1{left:355px;top:290px}.stormy1:before,.stormy:before{animation:stormy_thunder 2s steps(1) infinite;border-left:0 solid transparent;border-right:7px solid transparent;border-top:43px solid #ff0;box-shadow:-7px -32px #ff0;content:"";display:block;height:0;width:0;transform:rotate(14deg);transform-origin:50% -60px;position:absolute}.stormy1:after,.stormy:after{animation:rainy_rain .7s linear infinite;content:"";background:#ccc;border-radius:50%;display:block;height:6px;width:3px;opacity:.3;transform:scale(.9)}.stormy1:before,.stormy:before{left:50px;top:70px}@keyframes stormy_thunder{0%{transform:rotate(20deg);opacity:1}5%{transform:rotate(-34deg);opacity:1}10%{transform:rotate(0deg);opacity:1}15%{transform:rotate(-34deg);opacity:0}}.cloud-sun,.cloud-sun1{background:#fe4;border-radius:50%;box-shadow:0 0 0 5px rgba(255,255,0,.2);height:50px;width:50px;position:absolute}.cloud-sun{left:90px;top:270px}.cloud-sun1{left:405px;top:270px}.cloud-sun1:after,.cloud-sun:after{content:"";animation:allWeather 5s ease-in-out infinite;background:#fff;border-radius:50%;box-shadow:52px -12px 0 -4px #fff,20px -20px #fff,24px 8px #fff,48px 12px 0 -8px #fff,68px 4px 0 -4px #fff;height:50px;width:50px;position:absolute;left:-50px;top:30px}
